description: Transform LeIndex from Python to Rust-based Deep Code Intelligence Engine with integrated 5-layer code analysis. Complete greenfield rewrite with orchestrate-ready sub-tracks: leparse (AST), legraphe (PDG), lerecherche (search), lestockage (storage), lepasserelle (integration).
memory_notes: Maestro memory system not yet available in this project. Track memory storage deferred until memory infrastructure is implemented.
